## Description {#details}

An arbitrary precision integer that knows its signedness.

  labels = {["explicit"]}>
Construct an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apsint">APSInt</a> from a string representation.

This constructor interprets the string <code>Str</code> using the radix of 10. The interpretation stops at the end of the string. The bit width of the constructed <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apsint">APSInt</a> is determined automatically.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Str">the string to be interpreted.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/apsint-h/#l00044">44</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/apsint-h">APSInt.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/apsint-cpp/#l00021">21</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/apsint-cpp">APSInt.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
